page.title: 17TRANSPORT KINNERTON EVENJOBB
page.content: NEAREST RAILWAY STATION IS 8 MILES AWAY AT KNIGHTON,ON THE MID-WALES LINE NEAREST AIRPORTS,CARDIFF OR BIRMINGHAM ARE 6O MILES AWAY.THERE ARE 2 SERVICE BUSES ON TUESDAYS & SATURDAYS FROM CROSSGATES TO KINGTON & A LINK SERVICE FROM KINGTON TO HEREFORD BUT NO WAY OF RETURNING HERE FROM KINGTON.SCHOOL BUSES GO DAILY TO PRESTEIGNE & NEW RADNOR SCHOOLS.RADNOR VALLEY TRAVEL CLUB <A SELF HELP GROUP> RUNS A BUS TO HEREFORD ONCE A MONTH.CARS ARE THE MAIN SOURCE OF TRANSPORT,1 OR 2 FAMILIES RELY ON BICYCLES OR MOTOR- BIKES.LAND-ROVERS OR VANS ARE NECESSARY FOR WINTER TRAVEL.SOCIAL CARS ARE RUN FOR THE BENEFIT OF SENIOR CITIZENS WHO NEED TO VISIT THE DOCTOR, OR MAKE VISITS WHEN THE BUS IS NOT RUNNING.
